thread.title: Chelsea and Arsenal both fined by FA following stormy Stamford Bridge encounter - Salisbury Journal
thread.title_full: Chelsea and Arsenal both fined by FA following stormy Stamford Bridge encounter - Salisbury Journal - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Salisbury Journal
title: Chelsea and Arsenal both fined by FA following stormy Stamford Bridge encounter - Salisbury Journal
text:
Both Chelsea and Arsenal have been handed fines by the Football Association following the behaviour of their players in last month's London derby. In an ill-tempered game, Arsenal had both Gabriel and Santi Cazorla sent off as reigning Premier League champions Chelsea won 2-0 at Stamford Bridge.
 Salisbury Journal.
